title: Senior & Beginner Workout - 15 minute Gentle Chair Yoga
description:
Stand taller and join me in this great 15 minute chair yoga workout. This is a perfect routine if you are uncomfortable getting on the floor. The stretches included in this workout are appropriate for anyone and  also serve as a good stretch break if you sit at your desk all day.

Grab a chair, relax and find your breath as we gently stretch our shoulders, chest, triceps, glutes, thighs and back. 

Enjoy and please subscribe to SeniorShape!

Join SeniorShape on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/SeniorShapefitness/

https://www.instagram.com/seniorshape/

https://www.amazon.com/shop/seniorshapefitness
as an amazon associate/influencer I earn from qualifying purchases


seated yoga, chair exercises for seniors, chair yoga, seated yoga for beginners and seniors, easy chair yoga, chair workout, chair stretching
channelDescription:
Hello and welcome to SeniorShape with Lauren! I’m thrilled you have found my channel! I am an ACE (American Council on Exercise) certified fitness instructor. I also hold a specialization in senior fitness. 
It is my passion to create fun, new exercises and routines that are never boring. 
My videos are easy to follow and the exercises featured are specifically curated for beginners, and active older adults. The workouts are challenging and at a great pace that works well for anyone. 
Please subscribe so you never miss a new workout.

Equipment I use or recommend can be purchased on my Amazon store page www.amazon.com/shop/seniorshapefitness
*as an Amazon associate/influencer I earn from qualifying purchases

For those who have graciously asked to donate so I can continue to provide free videos can contribute through 
Venmo: @SeniorShape
I appreciate your support!

Thanks for working out with me!
Lauren

comments: This is just perfect for me!  I appreciate your calming gentleness and the beautiful surroundings.  I would love a longer version too❤️
17:40 For me, simply the best yoga site for seniors. Thank you very much, Lauren.
I am 75 and my mother is 100!  We try to do one of your easy chair yoga videos each morning.  Even though my mother has Alzheimer’s, your voice and exercises calm her down a great deal.  Thanks.

I just finished a year of Chemotherapy, Radiation and Immunotherapy and I needed to follow a program at home that would help me get back slowly.  I googled Chair Yoga and Chair Pilates and you popped up. I am so happy to have found you and your gifted way to teach yoga and pilates.
I’m very thankful for the variety your videos provide, from easy to more challenging workouts. This fits my needs and my abilities.
